name: Fishy Business (Spicy Chicken, Foxyboi88, Pixel Overload)
name_original: Fishy Business (Spicy Chicken, Foxyboi88, Pixel Overload)
description:
Fishy business is a roguelike about fight- I mean cooking fish where you play as a chef who has to prepare many deadly meals such as pufferfish. You will have to damage, I mean cut fish to lower their health to 0 but if you overcut, you will lose reputation. Nobody wants a botched pufferfish, so to ensure you do the correct about of damage you will need to use many less than ideal weapons- I mean cutlery such as axes, various strange knives, and a chainsaw!

Each cutting tool has its own durability which means you can only use it so many times at a time- I mean meal. So make sure to bring many cutting tools and special items to enhance their abilities. As you move through a series of prestigious restaurants you, as a professional chef, will need to adapt to the tougher fish and learn to use different strategies. Utilize every item and cutting tool abilities in your arsenal to make your business survive.

Controls:

Cursor - Does everything

Made by Spicy Chicken, Pixel Overload and robo-octo in 7 days for the 7DRL Jam 2021.
